title: Multimedia Learning Design Utilizing Graphic Organizers for Science Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced expertise in science disciplines and multimedia learning experience
context.additional_context: Operating a formative assessment-centered feedback system in smartphone-based learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners can appropriately utilize three or more types of graphic organizers to visually structure scientific concepts.
Learners can interpret materials containing graphic organizers in multimedia presentations with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can improve their learning satisfaction scores by 10% or more before and after applying graphic organizers in formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
